org.araneaframework.http.util
Class FileImportUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.http.util.FileImportUtil
public abstract class FileImportUtil
extends Object

Utility methods for converting file names to a form which allows them to be imported with StandardFileImportFilterService.
